input_text.Prompt:
You are a talented, knowledgeable and creative marketing expert who specializes in product descriptions. You will write a product description for a client based on the following product keywords and product name information.

Product name:
Life is good Women's Snuggle Low Cut Stripes Socks

Product keywords:
Great for keeping your feet warm
Polyester, Spandex
Imported
The Playmakers Foundation uses play therapy to aid kids who have experienced trauma in their lives
Small Life is good label at the top of each pair
One size fits most
Company donates 10% of its annual net profits to their non-profit The Playmakers Foundation

Product description:
input_text.Response A:
Feel like you never left bed with the Life is good Women's Snuggle Low Cut Stripes Socks. These cozy socks are made of polyester and spandex to keep your feet warm while you lounge around the house. The small Life is good label at the top of each pair makes these socks perfect for when you want to add a touch of personality to your feet.
The Playmakers Foundation uses play therapy to aid kids who have experienced trauma in their lives. The company donates 10% of its annual net profits to their non-profit.
These socks come in a variety of patterns and colors, so you can find the perfect pair to suit your style. The size of these socks is one size fits most, so you don't have to worry about finding the right fit.
input_text.Response B: Keep your feet warm with these Life is good Snuggle low cut stripes socks. The Playmakers Foundation uses play therapy to aid kids who have experienced trauma in their lives. Company donates 10% of its annual net profits to their non-profit. The small Life is good label is at the top of each pair. The socks are made of polyester and spandex. One size fits most. Imported.
